name: SHADOW WAR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later/TempleOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 3570K or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: SHADOW WAR is a third-person 5v5 action title with heavy strategic elements rewarding both tactically minded and mechanically focused players. Select from a roster of diverse and powerful characters and form a team to compete in intense matches.
